title.narrative: Technical assistance to the Ministry of Education, Science and Technology to strengthen the capacity of government to deliver its Education results and provide oversight monitoring and influencing functions through a programme funded post

description.narrative: This activity (Technical assistance to the Ministry of Education, Science and Technology to strengthen the capacity of government to deliver its Education results and provide oversight monitoring and influencing functions through a programme funded post) is a component of Education Programme For Results (EP4R) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £10,687,359. This component benefits Tanzania, and works in the following sector(s): Primary education, Secondary education. , with the following implementing partners: Mott MacDonald Limited. The start date is 27-02-2014 and the end date is 31-12-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
